title: racism
body:
[removed]
why is he  racism me i didnt says anything
plz help me

replies.body:
Dude. Riot don't care.

I had to name and shame a dude called [removed] on the forums for action to be taken.

[removed]. Let that sink in. He played with the moniker, [removed], and made it to Gold.

I've seen so many iterations of "%%%%%%" it hurts. Have been called a %%%% so many times, it's water off a duck's back now. Just mute and move on. Forget to report after game most of the time.

I suggest you do the same, but without forgetting to report.
if riot dont care im will back to Kr sever
Another fine example of chinese racism
